overview: Chi Chi grabs eleven of the hottest horn dogs in the biz today and lets them loose on each other in this over heated orgy. The star is the sexy, blue-eyed ADAM WOLFE. And he proves just why he's got a fuck flick dedicated to himself. PARKER WILLIAMS and SAL CORRELLI are pounding back a few brewski's in a back alley and need to take a piss.
title: Wolfe Pack
